plot: Jurgen Budday conducts the Hanoverian Court Orchestra; the Maulbronn Chamber Choir and soloists Michael Chance and Miriam Allen in Handel's Messiah at the Maulbronn Monastery.
title: Handel: Messiah
plot_es: Jurgen Budday conducts the Hanoverian Court Orchestra; the Maulbronn Chamber Choir and soloists Michael Chance and Miriam Allen in Handel's Messiah at the Maulbronn Monastery.
plot_en: Jurgen Budday conducts the Hanoverian Court Orchestra; the Maulbronn Chamber Choir and soloists Michael Chance and Miriam Allen in Handel's Messiah at the Maulbronn Monastery.
